name: DEUS EX MACHINA 2
blurb: The first multimedia video game that was ever made is reborn! \nStarring Christopher Lee.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Become part of the future of DEUS EX MACHINA! You get online access to vote on how DEUS EX MACHINA 2 looks and plays for Android and iOS formats. And your vote really counts!

the reward above plus        ...\r\nDEUS EX MACHINA 2, the MP3 rock album starring Christopher Lee and Ian Dury. On sale at Amazon for $6.99 so you're already saving! Plus free bonus tracks, alternate takes and interviews.

all the rewards above, plus ...\r\nDigital copy of Mel Croucher's fully illustrated book, DEUS EX MACHINA: THE BEST GAME YOU NEVER PLAYED IN YOUR LIFE, hilarious, heartbreaking, no-holds-barred, inside story of how the video games industry started and where it's all heading.
all the rewards above, plus ...\r\nHands-on of the playable pre-release version of DEUS EX MACHINA 2, with online voting rights to have your say on how the final version plays and scores.

all the rewards above, plus ... YOUR COPY OF THE FINAL RELEASE VERSION OF DEUS EX MACHINA 2. You'll have the choice between PC or Mac formats (available August 2013). Or you can choose to wait for your copy of DEUS EX MACHINA 2 for Andriod or iOS formats (available Autumn 2013).
all the rewards above, plus ...\r\nExclusive, fully playable emulation of the original 1984 version of DEUS EX MACHINA, including the original soundtrack, starring "Dr. Who" Jon Pertwee.
all the rewards above plus ... ADDITIONAL COPY OF THE FINAL RELEASE VERSION OF DEUS EX MACHINA 2 in ADDITIONAL FORMAT of your choice. Check the FAQs for current list of available formats.
all the rewards above, plus ... No-limit downloads of behind-the-scenes content: character sheets, alternate concepts, artwork, deleted stuff, and work-in-progress of new material.
all the rewards above, plus ...\r\nLimited edition "backers only" DEUS EX MACHINA 2 poster.

all the rewards above, plus ... Collector's Box Special: DEUS EX MACHINA: THE BEST GAME YOU NEVER PLAYED IN YOUR LIFE hardback book, DEUS EX MACHINA 2 the game on DVD, DEUS EX MACHINA 2 soundtrack album CD, all signed by the author.

upgrade to Collector's Box Exclusive: DEUS EX MACHINA: THE BEST GAME YOU NEVER PLAYED IN YOUR LIFE hardback book, DEUS EX MACHINA 2 the game on DVD, DEUS EX MACHINA 2 soundtrack album CD, all signed by the author - plus - limited edition DEUS EX MACHINA 2 poster signed by members of the team or members of the cast.

upgrade to Collector's Box Ultimate Edition: DEUS EX MACHINA original 1984 version on DVD, DEUS EX MACHINA original 1984 soundtrack album on CD - plus - DEUS EX MACHINA: THE BEST GAME YOU NEVER PLAYED IN YOUR LIFE hardback book, DEUS EX MACHINA 2 the game on DVD, DEUS EX MACHINA 2 soundtrack album CD, all signed by the author - plus - limited edition DEUS EX MACHINA 2 poster signed by members of the team or members of the cast.

all the rewards above including Collectors Box Ultimate Edition - plus - DEUS EX MACHINA: THE BEST GAME YOU NEVER PLAYED IN YOUR LIFE hardback book, signed personal dedication by the author - plus - your name in the end-credits in the book itself, all copies, all formats.
all the rewards above - plus - your name in the end-credits in the game itself, all copies, all formats.
all the rewards above - plus - your face will appear in the final "dissident files" sequence of the game itself, all copies, all formats, including future formats.
all the rewards above - plus - you will be featured with Associate Producer status in the credit sequence of the game itself, all copies, all formats, including future formats.

all the rewards above - plus - your invitation to spend the day with the authors and the team, followed by celebration party. Includes accommodation and full hospitality package, excludes travel to UK venue.
all the rewards above - plus - Unique item. The original boxed "Automata ZX Spectrum", signed by Mel Croucher and the original coder Andrew Stagg.

all the rewards above except the Unique items - plus - The original DEUS EX MACHINA session tape of JON PERTWEE as the Narrator. This unique item is the "wild recording" of the entire session from 1984, on the original open reel boxed tape. Plus, Co-Producer credit in the game itself, all formats including future formats, and your VIP invitation to spend time with us and enjoy our hospitality.

all the rewards above except the Unique items - plus - The original DEUS EX MACHINA session tape of IAN DURY as the Fertilizer. This unique item is the "wild recording" of the entire session from 1984, on the original open reel boxed tape. Plus, Co-Producer credit in the game itself, all formats including future formats, and your VIP invitation to spend time with us and enjoy our hospitality.

all the rewards above except the Unique items - plus - your framed and signed original portrait painted by celebrated sci-fi and fantasy artist Robin Evans (acclaimed artist for Starburst magazine, and creator of the original Deus Ex Machina artwork). You will have complete control over the theme and nuances of style, and personal sittings can be arranged in the UK. Plus, Co-Producer credit in the game itself, all formats including future formats, and your VIP invitation to spend time with us and enjoy our hospitality.
